tiles.name: Northern Peaks
tiles.description: Jagged, snow-capped mountains with frequent thunderstorms. Part of the wider mountain range, rocky and dangerous. Sparse vegetation. High magic presence.

tiles.name: Western Slopes
tiles.description: Steep, rocky slopes with hidden pathways and avalanche zones. Limited rivers fed by waterfalls. Possible Alchemical Ingredient Harvesting Spots. Wind Tunnels present.

tiles.name: Valley of Storms
tiles.description: A deep valley prone to severe thunderstorms, potentially containing ruins or remnants of Storm King sites. Mountain terrain.

tiles.name: Central Ridge
tiles.description: The main ridge of the mountain range. Contains the Tallest Peak. Approach to Zephyr's Lair and the Hidden Cave Entrance.

tiles.name: The Tallest Peak
tiles.description: Home to Zephyr's Hideout, this peak dominates the landscape. Frequent lightning strikes and strong winds. Potential magical nexus points.

tiles.name: Hidden Cave Entrance
tiles.description: A concealed entrance to the cave system beneath the mountain. Leading towards Zephyr's Laboratory/Library.

tiles.name: Eastern Outcrops
tiles.description: Rocky outcrops and scree slopes. Eastern side of the range. Ice formations common.

tiles.name: Zephyr's Laboratory
tiles.description: Deep within the mountain cave, containing Zephyr's Laboratory/Library. Focus of alchemical technology and elemental magic. Potential magical nexus points.

tiles.name: Southern Approach
tiles.description: The gentler slopes leading to the mountain range's base. Less treacherous than the northern peaks, but still dangerous. Sparse vegetation.
